=======
 ORG 100
LOP, CLE
 LDA Y
 CIR
 STA Y
 SZE
 BUN ONE
 BUN ZRO
ONE, LDA X
 ADD P
 STA P
 CLE
ZRO, LDA X
 CIL
 STA X
 ISZ CTR
 BUN LOP
 HLT
CTR, DEC -8
X, HEX 000F
Y, HEX 000B
P, HEX 0
 END
>>>>>>> assembly-to-binary/master
